Class Messages

java.lang.Object
com.sendly.resources.Messages
public class Messages extends Object
Messages resource for sending and managing SMS.

  • Method Details

    • send

      public Message send(String to, String text) throws SendlyException
      Send an SMS message.
      Parameters:
      to - Recipient phone number in E.164 format
      text - Message content
      Returns:
      The sent message
      Throws:
      SendlyException - if the request fails

    • schedule

      public ScheduledMessage schedule(String to, String text, String scheduledAt) throws SendlyException
      Schedule a message for future delivery.
      Parameters:
      to - Recipient phone number in E.164 format
      text - Message content
      scheduledAt - ISO 8601 datetime (must be at least 1 minute in the future)
      Returns:
      The scheduled message
      Throws:
      SendlyException - if the request fails

      Returns:
